__metadata__.label: BIDS variables
__metadata__.help: Manage current BIDS variables used as wildcards within the current snakemake pipeline.

__metadata__.label: Paths
__metadata__.help: Specify paths and directories to be used within the snakemake pipeline.

__metadata__.label: Snakemake settings
__metadata__.help: Specify setting variables required to run snakemake pipeline logic

__metadata__.label: String Formats
__metadata__.help: Specify snakemake wildcard template strings. These are used within the pipeline's snakefile to specify the base BIDS variables used for a specific dataset, without hard-coding those specific bids variables in the snakefile
